title: The configuration for a Telegram trigger handler
description: Defines the Telegram chats to send notifications to.

users.description: The list of user keys to send notifications to when this handler is triggered.

caption.description: Caption to send with the image message

annotateImage.description: Set to true to send an image with annotations overlaid for detected objects.

cooldownTime.description: Number of seconds required between sending notifications to the listed chats.

enabled.description: Enables the telegram handler on this trigger. Default is true.
